channel.title: Help - What Do I Put In Environment Variables?
channel.description:
Ok, i think ive screwed my Environment Variables "path" thing, somtimes i hear i need two, like a PATH and a classpath, and some people say its classpath. others say pathclass and just classpath im really confused. this is what i have so far: Path - Change To PATH And Erase Variable Value, and Replace With: (Don't Know) Classpath./Pathclass/Classpath - Create A New Variable, Name It (One Of The Three), And Change Variable Value Too: (Don't Know) So, If Anyone Could Help Me Out Here, It Would Be Great. Im Using JDK 6.0 As My Java Svenscap3pk As My Server Soarce And No-ip As My Sever IP - Saradomin.no-ip.biz Any Help Would Be Much Appriciated. Thanks To Anyone Who Can Help,
-Will

item.title: Help - What Do I Put In Environment Variables?
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

Ok, i think ive screwed my Environment Variables “path” thing, somtimes i hear i need two, like a PATH and a classpath, and some people say its classpath. others say pathclass and just classpath
im really confused.
this is what i have so far:
Path - Change To PATH And Erase Variable Value, and Replace With: (Don’t Know)
Classpath./Pathclass/Classpath - Create A New Variable, Name It (One Of The Three), And Change Variable Value Too: (Don’t Know)
So, If Anyone Could Help Me Out Here, It Would Be Great.
Im Using JDK 6.0 As My Java
Svenscap3pk As My Server Soarce
And No-ip As My Sever IP - Saradomin.no-ip.biz
Any Help Would Be Much Appriciated.
Thanks To Anyone Who Can Help,

-Will
